General.Name: Vina Concha To
General.Description: Viña Concha y Toro S.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes wines in primarily in Chile, Argentina, and the United States. It sells its premium wines, cellar collection, sparkling, and varietal wines under the Don Melchor, Amelia, Sendero, Tocornal, Vina Maipo, SBX, Cono Sur, Casillero Del Diablo, Isla Negra, Ocio, 20 Barrels, Diablo, Frontera, Gran Reserva, Gravas, Rose, Late Harvest, Marques De Casa Concha, Subercaseaux, Sunrise, Terrunyo, Bicicleta, Palo Alto, Trivento, Eolo, Fetzer, Bonterra, Jekel, Sanctuary, 1000 Stories, Trio, Concha y Toro, Carmin de Peumo, Santa Emiliana, Clos de Pirque, Reservado Concha y Toro, Descorcha, and other brand names. The company is also involved in real estate business. The company also exports its products. Viña Concha y Toro S.A. was founded in 1883 and is headquartered in Las Condes, Chile.
